name: Ice Cube Jump - one tap endless hyper casual game - jump from one glass to another
name_original: Ice Cube Jump - one tap endless hyper casual game - jump from one glass to another
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Ice Cube Jump is fun ice cube popping game. The goal of the game is to pop the ice to the top and to score as much as you can. Game is endless and as it progress it becomes harder and harder.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects.

Thank you!
